blocks.name: ssfz12
blocks.content: Subset relationship for finite sets of sequential integers. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 16-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssfz12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))))
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))), wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzfz1(c1, c0)
  mpcom(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wi(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))), wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  biimp3ar(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluz(c0, c1)
  eluzfz2(c1, c0)
  com14(wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))
  pm2.43i(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wi(wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))))))
  com24(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wi(wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))))
  ex(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wi(wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))))))
  syl(wa(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1))), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wi(wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))))), wcel(c0, co(c2, cfz, c3)))
  ssel2(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3), c0)
  com4t(wcel(c0, co(c2, cfz, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))
  ex(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wi(wcel(c0, co(c2, cfz, c3)), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))))
  3syl(wa(wss(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, cfz, c1))), wi(wcel(c0, co(c2, cfz, c3)), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))), wcel(c1, co(c2, cfz, c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  ssel2(co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c2, cfz, c3), c1)
  elfzuz3(c1, c2, c3)
  syl11(wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c2, cfz, c3)), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c2)), wi(wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c1)), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))), w3a(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c0)))
  eluz2(c0, c2)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c0), wi(wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c1)), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))))
  com13(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c1)), wi(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))))
  sylbi(wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c1)), wi(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))
  eluz2(c3, c1)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c3), wi(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c3))))
  pm3.21(wbr(c1, cle, c3), wbr(c2, cle, c0))
  elfzuz(c0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: elfz2z
blocks.content: Membership of an integer in a finite set of sequential integers starting at 0. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfz2z(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
} = {
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  bitri(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  elfz2nn0(c0, c1)
  df-3an(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  pm5.32rd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wb(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)))
  impbid2(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  nn0ge0(c0)
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  jca(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)))
  anim1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  elnn0z(c0)
  imp31(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  expcomd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  syld(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  0red(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cr))
  zre(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c1)
  letr(nat0, c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  simplbi2(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cn0))
  elnn0z(c1)
}

blocks.name: 2elfz3nn0
blocks.content: If there are two elements in a finite set of sequential integers starting at 0, these two elements as well as the upper bound are nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Apr-2018.)

blocks.name: fz0addcom
blocks.content: The addition of two members of a finite set of sequential integers starting at 0 is commutative. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-May-2018.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Jun-2018.)

blocks.name: 2elfz2melfz
blocks.content: If the sum of two integers of a 0-based finite set of sequential integers is greater than the upper bound, the difference between one of the integers and the difference between the upper bound and the other integer is in the 0-based finite set of sequential integers with the first integer as upper bound. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Apr-2018.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 31-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2elfz2melfz(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wi(wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), co(nat0, cfz, c0)))
  syl3anbrc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2))), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cle, c0))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cn0))
  mpan9(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wi(wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cn0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  syl2anc(wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wi(wcel(c0, cz), wi(wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cn0))), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  elfzel2(c2, nat0, c1)
  exp31(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cn0))
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2))), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cn0), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cz))
  zsubcld(c2, co(c1, cmin, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)))
  simplr(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  adantlr(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cz))
  zsubcl(c1, c0)
  imp(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c1), clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1)))
  ltsub1d(c1, co(c0, caddc, c2), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)))
  imp(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c2), cr))
  adantl(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c2), cr)))
  expcom(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c2), cr))
  zred(co(c0, caddc, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz)))
  zaddcl(c0, c2)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr))
  sylibd(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c1), clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c1), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1)))
  3syl(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)), wi(wbr(co(c1, cmin, c1), clt, co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1)), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c1), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cmin, c1), cr), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1), cr)))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c0, cr))
  anim12i(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  zre(c1)
  zre(c2)
  zre(c0)
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c0, cr)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c1), cr), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1), cr))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c1), cr))
  resubcld(c1, c1, wcel(c1, cr))
  id(wcel(c1, cr))
  resubcld(co(c0, caddc, c2), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c0, cr)))
  imp(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c2), cr))
  adantl(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c2), cr)))
  expcom(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c2), cr))
  readdcl(c0, c2)
  simpll(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  ltle(co(c1, cmin, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1))
  breq12d(co(c1, cmin, c1), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1), nat0, co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(c1, cmin, c1), nat0))
  subidd(c1, wcel(c1, cz))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cc))
  adantl(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(c2)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  eqtr4d(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), co(co(c2, caddc, c0), cmin, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, c2), cmin, c1, co(c2, caddc, c0), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  addcomd(c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  simp3(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  simp1(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  subsub3(c2, c1, c0)
  elnn0z(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wcel(c0, cn0))
  elfznn0(c0, c1)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wbr(c1, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wbr(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cle, c0))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wbr(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), cle, c0), wbr(c2, cle, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), caddc, c0)))
  breqtrrd(c2, cle, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), caddc, c0), c1, wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wbr(c2, cle, c1))

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), caddc, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  jca(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcnd(c1, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)))
  zcnd(c0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)))
  npcan(c1, c0)
  lesubadd2d(c2, co(c1, cmin, c0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, cr))
  zred(c2, wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1)))
  elfzelz(c2, nat0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cr))
  resubcld(c1, c0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)))
  zred(c1, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)))
  elfzel2(c0, nat0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c0, cr))
  zred(c0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)))
  elfzelz(c0, nat0, c1)
  elfz2nn0(co(c2, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c0)), c0)
}

blocks.name: fz0addge0
blocks.content: The sum of two integers in 0-based finite sets of sequential integers is greater than or equal to zero. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Jun-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fz0addge0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c3))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, caddc, c2)))
} = {
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c3))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c2, cn0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfz, c3)), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c2, cn0))
  elfznn0(c0, c1)
  elfznn0(c2, c3)
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c2, cn0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  nn0re(c0)
  nn0re(c2)
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  nn0ge0(c0)
  nn0ge0(c2)
  addge0(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: elfzlble
blocks.content: Membership of an integer in a finite set of sequential integers with the integer as upper bound and a lower bound less than or equal to the integer. (Contributed by AV, 21-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfzlble(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(c0, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cfz, c0)))
} = {
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(c0, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cfz, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, co(c0, cmin, c1))))
  syl3anbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, co(c0, cmin, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, c0))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  nn0z(c1)
  zsubcl(c0, c1)
  simpl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  nn0ge0(c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c0)
  nn0re(c1)
  subge02(c0, c1)
  eluz2(c0, co(c0, cmin, c1))
  eluzfz2(c0, co(c0, cmin, c1))
}

blocks.name: elfzelfzlble
blocks.content: Membership of an element of a finite set of sequential integers in a finite set of sequential integers with the same upper bound and a lower bound less than the upper bound. (Contributed by AV, 21-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfzelfzlble(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1))), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, cmin, c0), cfz, c2)))
} = {
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1))), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, cmin, c0), cfz, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(co(c2, cmin, c0), cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))))
  jca32(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1))), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(c2, cmin, c0), cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2))), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  sylbi(wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(w3a(wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))))
  elfz2(c1, nat0, c2)
  adantr(w3a(wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  3simpc(wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz)))
  ancomd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cz))
  zsubcl(c2, c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cz))
  simpl(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  3impia(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c2, cmin, c0), cle, c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2))), wi(wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c2, cmin, c0), cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2))), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wcel(c2, cr))
  zred(c2, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)))
  elfzel2(c1, nat0, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wcel(c0, cr))
  zre(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wcel(c1, cr))
  zred(c1, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)))
  elfzelz(c1, nat0, c2)
  sylibrd(w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c2, cmin, c0), cle, c1), wbr(c2, cle, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wi(wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wbr(c2, cle, co(c0, caddc, c1))), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))
  simp1(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  3adant1(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  ltle(c2, co(c0, caddc, c1))
  lesubadd2(c2, c0, c1)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  elfzle2(c1, nat0, c2)
  elfz2(c1, co(c2, cmin, c0), c2)
}
